fr.univ.lille1.ftp.server.request.data

Class FtpDataRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.univ.lille1.ftp.server.request.FtpRequest
      • fr.univ.lille1.ftp.server.request.data.FtpDataRequest
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    FtpListRequest, FtpNlstRequest, FtpRetrRequest, FtpStorRequest

    public abstract class FtpDataRequest
extends FtpRequest
    FtpDataRequest is the class that handles all the ftp transfer data requests with a custom data socket for the transfer

    Includes NLST, LIST, RETR and STOR requests

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Quentin Warnant
